original_title: Israel launches attack on Gaza City — RT World News
article_summary: British Ambassador to the US Peter Mandelson suggests that Ukrainian President Zelensky needs "flexibility" and Western security guarantees to overcome domestic opposition during peace negotiations with Russia. The specifics of the guarantees remain unclear, as the US has ruled out full NATO membership, while Russia has demanded an end to Western weapons supply to Ukraine. A Ukrainian man has been arrested in Italy for suspected involvement in the bombing of the Nord Stream gas pipelines in 2022.</s>
